I had such a great trip the first time I went out sailing with Captain Mike, I had to take my mom and husband out to experience the fun.  We were not disappointed.  

We had a great day in the bay watching the whales romp and play.  Additionally, we went back to the same beach I had visited before and got to go for a swim and enjoy a delightful lunch.  

I would recommend a trip out sailing for anyone who wants a day of fun in the sun.

460545438.name: The Perfect Evening!
460545438.author: a TripAdvisor user
460545438.reviewBody: Captain Mike, Michelle, and First Mate Johnny made my mom\'s 70th birthday celebration aboard the Indian Summer a night none of us will ever forget!  Captain Mike was incredibly accommodating and made sure everything was perfect from start to finish.  We boarded the beautiful boat and sailed out into the Bay of Banderas - and right into a group of whales.  Spectacular!!!! Mike put a microphone into the water, so we not only saw the whales, but we heard them, too.  It was unbelievable!  Michelle prepared all of my mom\'s favorite foods for her birthday dinner, and she even went to the local bakery to pick up the cake we ordered so it would be a surprise.  We sailed, we ate, we laughed - it was awesome!  The beautiful sunset was the cherry on top.  I couldn\'t imagine a better way to wish my mom a happy birthday!  Thanks to Mike and his crew, we made memories we will never forget! If you have the opportunity to sail with Mike and his crew - DO IT!

459409700.name: A wonderful evening
459409700.author: a TripAdvisor user
459409700.reviewBody: My children surprised my wife for her birthday with a sunset dinner cruise on the Indian Summer sail boat. The Indian Summer is a 45 foot sailing vessel that was spectacular!  It was a beautiful evening with calm waters a wonderful meal, attentive crew, and a great captain. We were lucky enough to see and hear whales as an added bonus. \n\nThe sunset was gorgeous. We could not have been more pleased with the afternoon and evening. My hat is off to Captain Mike, Michelle the cook and hostess and Johnny the cabin boy and crew.  I highly recommend this for families or groups.

459401394.name: Always a great day!
459401394.author: a TripAdvisor user
459401394.reviewBody: In the past month we did a whale watch cruise with Red Dolphin Cruises and also a whale watch and snorkel cruise. Both of them were wonderful days. We didn\'t get to see whales breaching, but we did get to listen to them and did see whales both days along with turtles and dolphins one day. Mike, Michelle and Johnny are very Knowledgeable about the whales and excellent hosts.  Michelle does wonderful things in the galley and the beer is cold. The boat has never felt crowded when we have been on it and are always treated well.  I highly recommend sailing with them. Please do remember though that whales don\'t perform on command and you may not see any, but do enjoy the boat and the people you are cruising with. We definitely will cruise with Red Dolphin again.

458586666.name: Sunset dinner and more
458586666.author: a TripAdvisor user
458586666.reviewBody: We just had a wonderful time cruising the Bay of Bana\nDandaras, MX.  The captain Mike was excellent, the crew Johnny and Michelle were very attentive,friendly and wonderful.  The sail boat comfortable.  Mike was fun and quite a great host.  The late afternoon evening cruise was fun and exciting.  We saw humpback whales AND heard them "talking".  The dinner amazing, margaritas yummy.  All 9 of us got a wonderful time.

456784827.name: What a crew!
456784827.author: a TripAdvisor user
456784827.reviewBody: Listened to whales talking to each other, saw whales, went swimming, ate and drank the entire time, had great conversation with interesting people, treated like kings...what more can you ask for.  Mike, Michelle, and Johnny are perfect hosts with a perfect setting.  This is my second time on the tour and I brought my parents this time...it did not disappoint!  I\'ll be coming back again, great value!

456415100.name: 4 hour cruise
456415100.author: a TripAdvisor user
456415100.reviewBody: Went out on a cruise yesterday with Mike, Michelle, and Johnny.  Had an absolute fabulous day!  They could not have been more generous, friendly or helpful on making our day the best!  Saw many whales which was very exciting for us.  Good food, drinks and company!  Recommend it to everybody!  Thanks for a great trip!  See you again on Sunday!

455743447.name: A Must Do Cruise!
455743447.author: a TripAdvisor user
455743447.reviewBody: Every year for the past 5 years, my sister has booked several Red Dolphin cruises during the winter season for her visiting friends and family (including me). We have gone on full day cruises and sunset cruises. Every trip is different as you can customize what you would like to do and where you would like to go. We have seen whales breaching right in front of us, dolphins racing along side the boat as we sail, and incredible small coastal villages and sunsets. The best feature is that it is a smaller vessel taking up to about a maximum of 12 guests. So, most of our trips were like private tours; much better than a large tour boat with many people and a pre-determined itinerary. Every trip is hosted by Mike, Michelle and Johnny who are the most hospitable and welcoming of hosts. They cater to your every need providing delicious refreshments (food and drinks) as well as commentary and anecdotes throughout the tour. They get along with all ages and types of people. Mike is an expert sailor so you are in competent hands. All tours have been awesome and this is must do activity for my sister, all of her guests and me.

441162958.name: great tour, saw lots of whales
441162958.author: a TripAdvisor user
441162958.reviewBody: Great service, the couple that runs the boat did a great job, found lots of whales and they served some snacks and drinks on our outing.  plan on booking a couple of more tours with them this coming January for our next trip to the area

440742909.name: Amazing Day!
440742909.author: a TripAdvisor user
440742909.reviewBody: We would highly recommend this sailing trip. Mike and Michelle were wonderful and food and drinks were great too! We snorkeled, kayaked, swam and relaxed the day away, ending with the sunset and also ran into a school of dolphins! We all had a great time and we look forward to the next time.It was the highlight of our vacation. Lee & Louise

439834338.name: Awesome Trip
439834338.author: a TripAdvisor user
439834338.reviewBody: Mike and crew were absolutely awesome! We had a great time and they pulled off my proposal for my now fiance perfectly! We couldn\'t have asked for a better experience and I would absolutely recommend anyone that is interested in booking a charter to use Mike and Michelle as they are the best in all areas!

364888166.name: The best day of our vacation!
364888166.author: a TripAdvisor user
364888166.reviewBody: Everything about our experience with Red Dolphin Sailing Charters was excellent from start to finish: prompt response to our inquiry, arranging the reservation, easy to find marina location, and of course, the sail itself. Captain Mike took five of us from La Cruz de Huanacaxtle to the charming village of Yelapa, across the Bay of Banderas. Mike was friendly, informative, and just plain fun to spend the day with. Michelle made us a delicious breakfast, lunch, and beverages, and Johnny was very skilled and incredibly attentive. The sail home from Yelapa aboard the beautiful Indian Summer was the crowning touch to a wonderful day. We look forward to our next sail with Red Dolphin; don\'t miss this when in the Puerto Vallarta area!

363986399.name: Lovelier the second time around!
363986399.author: a TripAdvisor user
363986399.reviewBody: This is our second time with Mike, Michelle and Johnny, we loved it the first time and can we say loved it even more this time! Top notch personal attention, great food, great people and a lovely sailing experience.  We will definitely be back for a third time!  Don\'t miss this opportunity for a wonderful time out on the water.

361637078.name: One of my favorite vacation days ever!
361637078.author: a TripAdvisor user
361637078.reviewBody: Seven of us spent all day on Mike\'s boat, sailing from Puerto Vallarta to Nayarit and back.  Mike was a wonderful host\u2014very friendly to all.  Michelle and Johnny kept the delicious food coming all day\u2014yogurt, granola and berries for breakfast, mid-morning sandwich, burritos for lunch, mahi mahi for dinner, and cocktails all day.  We saw whales but, just as exciting, we heard them with Mike\'s aquatic microphone.  We tracked them for nearly an hour, watched them jump, and listened to three distinctly different whale voices, whose volume increased and decreased as they drew nearer and farther from the boat.  Unforgettable!  Thanks, Mike!

357250298.name: Sailing!
357250298.author: a TripAdvisor user
357250298.reviewBody:
We had an excellent 3 hours on the bay.  Mike and his crew of Michelle and Johnny were friendly and helpful.  The boat is just beautiful.  We left the marina and cruised around the harbor enjoying the sun and waves and dolphins.  Johnny and Michelle kept us fed and hydrated.  Mike was very friendly and had great stories to tell.  
This boat trip does not go to the Marietas Islands.  It's more of a relaxing time on the water.  
We spent some time anchored while we swam, kayaked and paddleboarded.
A highly recommended trip with a wonderful crew.

351455632.name: Amazing Day on the Water
351455632.author: a TripAdvisor user
351455632.reviewBody: My family has been visiting Bucerias for almost 20 years and we have never gone sailing.  This year my girlfriends and I decided to give it a try and I will make it a yearly excursion.  The trip to a private beach was amazing.  We had a great time in the water and on the boat.  Captain Mike and crew have earned their reputation for being both professional and fun.  It was an Amazing Day!

347583158.name: Make sure you know where you are going
347583158.author: a TripAdvisor user
347583158.reviewBody: Four of us paid for this cruise based on the flyer the company puts out.  It said whale watching but there were no whales.  After riding the boat for nearly an hour we asked when we would see whales and the captain said it was not a whale watching cruise despite the flyer saying that was what the cruise would be.  Nice people and nice boat but it was over sold, my opinion, as there was very little seating to go around.  Just be sure you know what the purpose of the trip is before you pay or before you go.

346353696.name: excellent half day on the Water
346353696.author: a TripAdvisor user
346353696.reviewBody: the crew Capt Mike, Michelle and Johnny were great.  we went the first week in feb. 2016 whale watching but with no luck as this year is not a good whale watching year.\nBut Capt Mike and crew made it fun.  We were staying at Paradise Village resort and it was so nice to just walk to the boat.  Capt Mike kept our interest with all his stories and adventures .  It was a great day of Sailing and next time we want a longer trip.

335681392.name: Outstanding day on the water
335681392.author: a TripAdvisor user
335681392.reviewBody: The twelve of us (6 adults and 6 20+ year olds) had a great day on the boat with Mike, Michelle and Johnny. We were headed to Yelapa, which is a very cool spot and were lucky to see whales and dolphins along the way (evidently it has been a tough whale watching season). The catamaran had sails up and was quite comfortable - room for sunbathers and those who want shade. Michelle prepared a snack on the way out and a delicious lunch for return. At Yelapa, we climbed to the waterfall, explored the town and had a drink on the beach. Overall, a great day with a terrific crew in a very nice boat. What could be bad!

328494100.name: Great 4 hour tour!
328494100.author: a TripAdvisor user
328494100.reviewBody: We took the Lover\'s Beach cruise for 5 people (4 hours) and it was exactly what we were hoping for! Relaxing, beautiful, fun! Great way to get on the water and avoid the tourist traps!

300880666.name: Amazing day! Amazing crew!
300880666.author: a TripAdvisor user
300880666.reviewBody: Went out on the Red Dolphin for a half day cruise (perfect amount of time) with a group of 11 and enjoyed a sail to a secluded beach at the tip of the bay. The Paddle board and guitar were enjoyed as well as jumping off the boat. Lunch and drinks were provided, life vest were easily accessible. This would be a wonderful boat to enjoy a sunset cruise. We will see you again next spring!

259668807.name: Perfect Sunset Sail!
259668807.author: a TripAdvisor user
259668807.reviewBody: Not much I can add to the prior reviews, but to say it\'s all spot on! My friend and I joined a sunset sail with about 8 other fun Canadians who are now good friends! At first I wasn\'t sure if ten would be too many but the boat is really spacious, with room to move about on the bow, stern and cockpit, so it never felt crowded. And everything others have said about Mike, Johnny and Michelle is so right on - Mike is a great Captain, putting everyone at ease and the appetizers Michelle made were delicious. Johnny made sure everyone had drinks the whole trip and were taken care of, plus it was great chatting with him! Loved Loved Loved it! Had dolphins near the boat, and a gorgeous sunset! It was my friend\'s first time sailing and now I know she\'ll be back out with me. Would absolutely love to go back! Thanks Indian Summer and Crew! See you next year! Jen & Sarah

256373721.name: Sailing Tours at their FINEST!
256373721.author: a TripAdvisor user
256373721.reviewBody: Mike, Michelle & Johnny provide their GUEST with the best Sailing Tours available. We have in the past three months sailed with them 3 times and cant wait until we are able to do so again.\nThey spoil all their guest with outstanding service and kindness. And the whales were cooperative as well.....so close at one time the camera couldn\'t even focus on time. We appreciated Mike\'s knowledge of the whales and his respect for their well being as well. I HIGHLY recommend a sail on the Indian Summer for anyone and everyone in the La Cruz or PV area.

256084901.name: Great day on the water with Mike & crew
256084901.author: a TripAdvisor user
256084901.reviewBody: We chartered the sail boat today for our family of 6 (including one baby). We had a blast! Mike, Michelle and Johnny were incredibly kind and attentive. Mike took us to a quiet island where we could play in the water and not be crowded out by lots of tourists. The weather was beautiful and we even saw several different whale groups. I highly recommend a day of sailing with the Red Dolphin. They were incredibly awesome and accommodating for all ages.

254684929.name: Mike & Crew are awesome!
254684929.author: a TripAdvisor user
254684929.reviewBody: We caught the boat at Paradise Village Resort - we had a great day seeing many whales breaching out of the bay right in front of us! \nMike made the whole trip fun and interesting!

253589273.name: Unforgettable Day with Whales & Dolphins
253589273.author: a TripAdvisor user
253589273.reviewBody:
My small group experienced an incredible and unforgettable day with Mike and Johnny; unfortunately, Michelle couldn't join us that day on the boat, but we wish she could have because she's very sweet.

Mike (the owner/driver of the boat) was very welcoming and warm, while Johnny took care of us from the moment we walked on the boat to the moment we got off of it. 

We couldn't have asked for more perfect weather; there wasn't a cloud in the sky. We went sailing for a few hours in hopes of finding whales and not only did we see whales, we saw whales up close multiple times and were in the middle of a pod of about 100 dolphins jumping and swimming around the boat. It was beautiful! Mike knows the water and the animals so well that he could navigate where the whales and dolphins were going and directed the boat in that direction so we could be closer when they surfaced.

We anchored and were able to kayak close to the shore of a beautiful beach, too. While we were anchored, he also made an exquisite dinner for our group. 

After an already great day, the cherry on top was the perfect sunset we saw heading back to the marina. Mike noticeably takes pride in providing exceptional customer service and is passionate about sailing.

I would recommend a day with Mike to everyone; it's worth every minute and every dollar. He truly created a day of memories for us and we will do it again the first opportunity we get.

253548417.name: Once in a lifetime experience!
253548417.author: a TripAdvisor user
253548417.reviewBody: We had the pleasure of going out on Mike and Michelle\'s beautiful sailboat - Indian Summer. I am not sure what part of the experience was the most amazing, a toss up between the beautiful day sailing, seeing many dolphins, following wales along the coast line or the spectacular food, drinks and company. If you treat yourself to one thing while near La Cruz - this is it!

253452052.name: We found the Whales
253452052.author: a TripAdvisor user
253452052.reviewBody: Offered drinks and snacks, friendly staff.  We found the Whales and got some great pictures, would go again.

253199126.name: Fantastic day!
253199126.author: a TripAdvisor user
253199126.reviewBody:
We have done several whale watches, but this one was the best!  We were met in the lobby of our resort (how convenience is that!?) and escorted to this fabulous sailboat.  The crew, Captain Mike, Michelle, and Johnny, were awesome.  We were offered coffee, bottled water, fruit, yogurt and granola to start.  A little later we had delicious warm bread with cheese and meat (yum!) and rum punch (yum yum!) or margaritas.  The boat was very comfortable and the crew attentive.

The best part, and you can never tell how this will play out, was the breaches right in front of us.  We had breaches and breaches - about twenty of them!  We had a mom with her newborn and then a pair of adult whales that did many - including a double breach.  It was really fantastic!  My husband is working on getting some video from his GoPro on to youtube - he will name it Red Dolphin.  

I highly recommend spending a day of your vacation with these guys...we will each year we return!

253105890.name: Whale of a tail!
253105890.author: a TripAdvisor user
253105890.reviewBody: Great trip! Very personal able crew from Skipper Mike, Michelle & Johnny! Snacks& beverages just lovely! Would recommend charter trips , you are treated like guests visiting their home!

251783701.name: A Perfect Day
251783701.author: a TripAdvisor user
251783701.reviewBody: Thank you to Mike, Michelle and Johnny for "A Perfect Day".  Right from being greeted in the lobby of our resort to helping us off the boat when we landed they were the perfect hosts.  It was amazing to see whales breaching and a "show" put on by one  who kept slapping his tail down on the water. We even saw Dolphins and learned about some of the different birds who were out catching fish. Our trip whale watching on the Indian summer was amazing and we will definitely sail with them again!\ud83d\ude03

247164032.name: We had a whale of a time!
247164032.author: a TripAdvisor user
247164032.reviewBody: Michael, Michelle and Johnny did a wonderful job of giving us a perfect sailing experience. We were a large family group, and they accommodated everyone.\nIt was very nice that the whales cooperated and put on a great "breaching" show!\nAmazing!

246271440.name: A Day to Remember Forever!
246271440.author: a TripAdvisor user
246271440.reviewBody: Mike and Michelle, the owners of Red Dolphin Sailing Charyers are simply the best at what they do! They are the perfect hosts and very knowledgeable about the Bay Area. Their yacht, Indian Summer, is beautiful, comfortable and perfect for an intimate sailing adventure. Our entire family has always wanted to see the whales and we were not disappointed. Captain Mike knew just where to go and we were given quite the show! All of us will remember this day forever and are already planning our next charter on Indian Summer.  Honestly, this is the smartest money you will spend in PV and you will not want the day to end. Period! I love these guys!

245987286.name: Red Dolphin Sailing Charters
245987286.author: a TripAdvisor user
245987286.reviewBody: Just spent the day out on Indian Summer with Mike, Michelle and Johnny.  What a lovely crew and a great day.  We showed up a bit early and they welcomed us aboard and were ready to go.  Plenty to eat and drink throughout the day.  We were on a snorkeling trip but were lucky enough to spot a few pods of whales.  Each time we saw them, Mike took the time to give us a closer look.  There were only seven of us on this cruise...so happy that we weren\'t on one of the boats we saw with 100 - 150 people!  I would highly recommend Red Dolphin Sailing Charters.

242944639.name: Fantastic
242944639.author: a TripAdvisor user
242944639.reviewBody: Indian Summer is a beautiful boat and Mike and Michelle are the epitome of hospitality. If you get a chance to go out on the bay with these two and Johnny, don\'t miss it. I have been out on Bandaras Bay a few times over the years with other outfits and none come close to offering the experience we had with Red Dolphin Sailing Charters. The boat is impecably clean and while on it you will want for nothing. Michelle is a fantastic cook and the fish she served for lunch was the best prepared I had while visiting. I will, without a doubt, see these fine people again when I return to Nayarit. Thank you. Caveat: If you are a small party and dont want to be grouped up with other people, get yourself a private charter.

241710609.name: Awesome Sailing Day
241710609.author: a TripAdvisor user
241710609.reviewBody: Having been to the PV area many times, we are always in search of something new and different to do for our large group. Mike & Michelle, along with Johnny, where just that! They provided our group of nine with the best first ever sailing the bay experience. The boat was wonderful, the food was mouth watering and their fun loving spirit made this a trip to remember. Recommend to all!

241585463.name: Amazing Day!
241585463.author: a TripAdvisor user
241585463.reviewBody: Our group of nine were very fortunate to join Captain Mike, Michelle and Johnny on an amazing day of sightseeing to Yelapa. The boat, "Indian Summer" was very clean, Michelle\'s cooking was absolutely amazing and Johnny was very attentive to ensure that none of us were ever without an ice cold beverage.  One of our guests has recently suffered a fall and all three staff members took particularly amazing care to ensure that she was safe and enjoyed the entire trip.\n\nThere are many options for boat excursions along the Bay, but none of them offer this type of service, it was an amazing day!

236398249.name: Great day on the bay!
236398249.author: a TripAdvisor user
236398249.reviewBody: Thanks to Mike, Michelle and Johnny for taking great care of us while we cruised on Indian Summer along the coast to the Marietta\u2019s islands.  It was nice to have personalized service on a boat build for luxury not gluttonous partying.  We set off in the morning from the wonderful marina in La Cruz and took our time getting out to the islands.  Along the way we saw dolphins, cool birds and flying fish!  Michelle made the most wonderful snacks, while Captain Mike gave us a bit of local history and Johnny kept our glasses full! When we arrived to the islands, Johnny our deckhand and tour guide escorted us into hidden beach and made sure we made it back safe and sound.   Ironically there was a big \u201cparty boat\u201d there when we arrived and the people we spoke to from that boat were really jealous to find out we had 10 people on our boat and more than enough equipment for all of us.  The second part of the trip brought us around the islands for more time to kayak, snorkel, sun tan, etc.   Then Michelle made us a fabulous lunch, homemade fresh fish and Spanish rice with mango salsa \u2013 OMG it was amazing.  On the way back we had the sails up and enjoyed the views of the bay.  Maybe we lucked out by having great folks to share our cruise with, but this was the best tour we have done in all our trips to Mexico.  Thanks again to Mike, Michelle and Johnny.

200709860.name: A "whale" of a day!
200709860.author: a TripAdvisor user
200709860.reviewBody: Thank you Mike and Michelle for making our 15th wedding anniversary such a treat!  Just a fabulous crew, meal, conversation and sailing day.  And to top it off, even though at the end of the season, hubby Bob was ready with his camera for the "whale" pic!  I highly recommend Red Dolphin, we were walking around La Cruz marina and saw the sign on boat, emailed Mike and we sailing the next day!!  First class,  great for any ages, you won\'t be disappointed! Why go with 50 others when you can go with 6-12 folks and really relax!!   We will be back!

199826960.name: Fabulous whale watching and snorkeling!
199826960.author: a TripAdvisor user
199826960.reviewBody:
I loved my afternoon on the Red Dolphin sailboat; it was a fabulous vessel run by an amazing staff! Our experience even influenced my husband and I to consider buying a similar vessel as a potential retirement plan. The staff was welcoming, helpful and personable; they really helped us feel at ease. The food was fantastic; it was truly the icing on the cake of this journey. That, and also the fact that the boat stereo was playing classic rock, which pleased me immensely. We received a few snacks and a wonderful lunch, and the drinks were always freshened up.
While I chose not to snorkel, my husband said he had a wonderful time doing so. And I got to chill out with a nice bit of tequila while he went swimming!
We had ample time to sit and watch a humpback mother and calf do some breaching, which was a truly memorable experience, one I will always cherish.The staff took such good care of us, making sure we got the most out of our snorkeling and whale watching experiences, that the trip felt like an afternoon with friends, not hurried or structured, but relaxed and casual.
I would certainly recommend this charter service to others!

199325210.name: Beautiful Day on the Bay
199325210.author: a TripAdvisor user
199325210.reviewBody: Mike and Michelle are easy and relaxed making everyone on our boat feel welcome and at ease.  We sailed from La Cruz to Yelapa, a town only accessible by boat.  Mike took us on a lovely walk through Yelapa and then we returned to the boat for a delicious meal prepared by Michelle.  We saw a whale, turtles and a giant Ray.  It was an amazing day.  Very pampering and special.  Not too expensive but worth every penny!  I\'d go do it again in an instant - and plan to.

199096099.name: Family Trip to Yelapa
199096099.author: a TripAdvisor user
199096099.reviewBody: We have sailed with Mike and Michelle before!!  Again it was a fabulous experience!!  Everything is top of the line to include the food, drinks and best of all the Company!!  They have a very comfortable boat with everything you would need and they work very hard (owning a boat ourselves) to keep it in excellent condition!!  Mike made sure that we got up close to see the whales when in fact we were suppose to "just sail to Yelapa"  my adult family appreciated his extra attention to making this awesome adventure as full as possible!!  Michelle is an awesome cook and would love to have her recipes!! They have added a great new mate, Jonathan, that would follow us from bow to the stern to make sure we would not fall overboard!!  (Something Only a Mom would notice) That was so nice to be able to relax and know that SWEET Jonathan was there to get another drink or make sure they were safe!!

198973711.name: Whale watching aboard the Red Dolphin
198973711.author: a TripAdvisor user
198973711.reviewBody:
My day aboard the  Red Dolphin sailboat in La Cruz de  Huanacaxtle Mexico was a 
great experience,!The captain and owner, Mike, is knowledgeable about Banduras
Bay and the points of  interest; including lots of whale sighting!  Michelle prepared an
amazing, delicious lunch!  Crew member, Johnny served beverages, snacks and offered
his help in moving around the boat.  It was a fun day with a great boat and crew!  I would
recommend sailing on this smaller boat rather than the large party/drinking boats for a
whale-watching adventure,.

197170063.name: Awesome Day.
197170063.author: a TripAdvisor user
197170063.reviewBody: Thx Mike and Michelle and Johnny for hosting a fantastic day trip.The food to the cold beverages to all the great answers to all our questions.Our 1st trip to Yelapa was wonderful.Loved the walkabout,the waterfall and the cold beers,chips and salsa.The whales gave us a great show.That was so exciting.Would recommend this trip and Red Dolphin  Sailing Charters.

196368210.name: Magical Family Day
196368210.author: a TripAdvisor user
196368210.reviewBody: Thank you Mike, Michelle and Johnny for an awesome experience on the Bay of Banderas. Seeing mother whales with their calves, cavorting dolphins and the very big, very brave sea turtles swimming on the surface of the water was memory-making. As "Grandma" on the trip I especially appreciated all the questions Mike answered to Ainsley and Matthew.\nWe highly recommend this opportunity to see nature in nature!

195591355.name: An Extra Extraordinary Day
195591355.author: a TripAdvisor user
195591355.reviewBody: From the moment Michelle, Mike, and crewman, Johnny, warmly welcomed us aboard their sailing boat one felt a special time was about to be had by all. The atmosphere was relaxing as we were pampered with beverages and able to move about the boat to experience a variety of viewing points to whale watch. While we savored our warm seafood lunch the mood aboard the boat switch from sighs of contentment to one filled with amazement and wonderment. Those of us at the stern were first to realize we had company joining us as the back of a humpback whale appeared just a few meters away. This "curious" creature graced us with its company for a good while as it circled and swam under the boat. One will never forget the feeling of awe that came over us all. What was already an extraordinary outing, due to the services and congeniality of the members of the Red Dolphin Charters turned into a extra extraordinary one!  Annabelle

195508007.name: Mike hit it out of the park
195508007.author: a TripAdvisor user
195508007.reviewBody: I was a little skeptical of going whale watching in La Cruz, as I\'ve had some pretty ho hum experiences. This turned out to be the best day on the water ever. Not only do Mike and Michelle warmly invite you onto their home, but the whale watching turned out to be brilliant. Check out Michelle\'s video on YouTube to get a taste of one of the many whale encounters we had on the trip. It was a once in a lifetime experience. Home run Mike, tough to top.

195341127.name: Peter, Dayna, Treva and Dave, Wonderful Day on the water!!!!
195341127.author: a TripAdvisor user
195341127.reviewBody: Our family had the great pleasure of going whale watching with Mike, Michelle and Johnny and it was a day we will never forget!! Started the tour around 930 am and by 1030  we had already spotted whales. We not only spotted them but they were so close you could almost touch them , truly amazing creatures. Mike and Michelle and crew Johnny are fantastic hosts, serving drinks and a wonderful lunch prepared by Michelle. A trip we would recommend to anyone!! Thanks again we will be back.

195267018.name: Oh my God,Oh My God!!!!
195267018.author: a TripAdvisor user
195267018.reviewBody: My family and I had the immense pleasure of going out with Mike, Michelle and Jonny this morning . We not only saw whales but we could almost touch them. They were  swimming so close to the boat, in fact they were at one point under the boat and we got some amazing video and still pictures. I can now scratch this off my bucket list. Thank you so much Mike, Michelle and Jonny, your hospitality along with the great food and drinks far superseded anything we could hope for! Tanya, Peter, Emily Hunerfauth . Oh ya check out their Facebook page for the video!

195122242.name: a wonderful sailing experience!
195122242.author: a TripAdvisor user
195122242.reviewBody:
Two friends and I recently joined the crew and 2 couples aboard  "Indian Summer" for a voyage to Las Marietas for a an hour of snorkeling.

It took about 2 very pleasant hours to get to the island, with beverages and snacks provided en route. The seas were calm and the scenery beautiful.
Once at the island we enjoyed snorkeling in waters with good visibility. We swam through an open-ended cave to arrive at a hidden, sandy beach.  There were plenty of fish, and some colorful coral, some of which I had not seen before, although I have snorkeled many places.
On our return trip we were treated to beer and mahi with mahi with rice. It was well prepared and presented.
The crew of Mike, Michelle and Johnny is very friendly and accommodating.  The boat is very clean and well-managed. There was interesting conversation while we were underway
.
We saw lots of whales and a few dolphins.  I had a better view of whales here than I have ever had.  They breached constantly, jumping right up out of the water and allowing us to see their entire length.
The experience did not feel at all commercial, but rather as though we had been invited to a friend's boat.
I thoroughly recommend this excursion of approximately 6 hours duration.

194669441.name: EXCEPTIONAL...a magical experience!!
194669441.author: a TripAdvisor user
194669441.reviewBody: As  a resident of the Virgin Islands for a number of years, it is always my wish to go out sailing whenever the opportunity presents itself.  After much research of the Puerto Vallarta area, we opted for Red Dolphin Sailing Charters due to proximity to where we were staying.  From a first meeting with Mike, prior to the scheduled trip, we knew that we would not be disappointed as he is a most cordial and fascinating individual who is very passionate about his sailing.  We booked for a 4 hour sunset sail that "far exceeded" our expectations...great company, superb meal (gourmet quality) and drink, whale watching at it\'s best and topped by a beautiful sunset! For all this...truly an incredible value!!  It was an experience that will never be forgotten!!  Thank you Mike, Michelle and all...SEE YOU NEXT YEAR!!

194569321.name: Best Day In Mexico
194569321.author: a TripAdvisor user
194569321.reviewBody: We had an outstanding day, we seen plenty or whales and dolphins.  Mike and Michelle were wonderful hosts! We had amazing snacks and a wonderful mahi mahi lunch.  Michelle is a fabulous cook! We had such a wonderful family day, we went snorkeling and whale watching. The boat was a great size and we had so much more fun then going on a huge boat with 50 other people.  It was very clean! Johnny was constantly making sure we had plenty of drinks and food. Mike had great stories and was extremely friendly, we left feeling like we met some new friends! We truly had the perfect day in Mexico! This would be one of our best days here.

194545482.name: A Great Trip!
194545482.author: a TripAdvisor user
194545482.reviewBody: My husband and I spent a delightful afternoon aboard the Red Dolphin. We saw plenty of whales (huge!), enjoyed Mike\'s special recipe of rum punch (potent!), thoroughly enjoyed Michelle\'s grilled mahi-mahi (delicious!), and were awestruck at the beautiful sunset (romantic!). This was a great way to get out on the water on a beautiful day and experience w whole different side to life in Mexico.

194508548.name: Amazing Day on the Bay!
194508548.author: a TripAdvisor user
194508548.reviewBody: We booked with Red Dolphin Sailing Charters and spent the day yesterday on the Indian Summer (the name of the yacht) with Mike, Michelle and Johnny.  We have been on many tours and adventures in the Vallarta area and this one tops the list and at a reasonable price.  We saw numerous whales and dolphins.  We went snorkeling at Marietas Islands where Michelle took us under the arch and into the cave.  Johnny made sure we always had something to drink and was the spotter for whales, etc.  Michelle made nachos for a snack and then a delicious mahi mahi lunch.  Mike guided the yacht and had numerous stories for us.  It was like we had known Mike for many years.  Outstanding Day. Thanks Mike, Michelle and Johnny.

194304137.name: Wales & Whales
194304137.author: a TripAdvisor user
194304137.reviewBody: We had a very enjoyable time.  The captain (MIKE) and crew (Michelle and Johnny) were very personable and interesting.  We did not see as much of Michelle as we would have liked as she was busy in in the galley preparing a beautiful lunch featuring mahi-mahi. We saw a lot of whales, some of which actually breached and sea turtles.  The vessel is absolutely spotless and well cared for.  The food was great,the company was great and we saw lots of wildlife.  What else could you ask for. Our only regret is that we did not book it for 8 hours.  Would recommend to anyone!

193863187.name: Wonderful cruise
193863187.author: a TripAdvisor user
193863187.reviewBody:
We had the opportunity to go on a sunset cruise on Mike and Michelle's boat on Feb 10/14. This was a wonderful evening with great company .
We are staying in La Cruz so just had to walk to the marina and get on the boat. 
We were greeted with hugs and off course cold beer.
We saw several whales and the beautiful sunset.
Michelle made a delicious meal of mahi mahi with mango sauce .
Mike supplied us with his version of painkiller ie Rum Punch with a touch of nutmeg!
It was a wonderful way to spend several hours on a 45 foot sail boat.

193502303.name: Red Dolphin Outing
193502303.author: a TripAdvisor user
193502303.reviewBody: Everything about it was great!  Mike, the captain, was congenial and entertaining.  A meal of mahi mahi was delicious and drinks available the entire time.  We saw MANY whales, dolphins and manta rays. We were not disappointed.  He didn\'t skimp on anything and we had a very enjoyable four hour cruise.

193479697.name: Fantastic trip as always, we highly recommend...different than others :)
193479697.author: a TripAdvisor user
193479697.reviewBody: We have been out with Red Dolphin Sailing Charters several times and again loved it. Different from others in the bay as it is on a lovely sailing vessel with very special hosts Mike and Michelle. The wildlife is amazing from dolphins, whales, turtles to blue footed booby birds and so much more. I highly recommend this experience to all. Great job Mike & Michelle

193359855.name: Whale of a time with Mike and crew!
193359855.author: a TripAdvisor user
193359855.reviewBody: Visiting La Cruz?  Don\'t miss the opportunity for a fantastic sunset cruise!   Top notch fun, food and drinks all while crusing the bay watching many whales, dolphons and man o ray. This excursion will not disappoint!\nAmy W

193337715.name: Red Dolphin Rocks
193337715.author: a TripAdvisor user
193337715.reviewBody: We want to thank you for taking us out on the tour to the Marrietas island. \nMike is a skillful sailer who made us feel safe while he took us out there in comfort making the trip really comfortable. The Red Dolphin is definitely your choice if you like a day trip under sails in the Bay of Banderas, no engine fumes just the sound of the wind, the waves and lot\'s of Whale sightings.. can it get any better?\nSuperb food, endless drinks and lot\'s of Whales. Thank you Michelle and Mike for a wonderful day.

193305876.name: Red Dolphin Sailing Charter a great experience!
193305876.author: a TripAdvisor user
193305876.reviewBody: 10 of us (5 couples) stayed in La Cruz, just a little ways out of Puerto Vallarta, and Red Dolphin Sailing Charter was recommended to us by someone who lives in La Cruz.  We were NOT disappointed.  Our group enjoyed a 4 hour cruise hosted by Mike, the charter\'s owner, on his beautiful 45 ft sailboat!.   Mike and his crew treated us as valued guests. Mike was very informative and something that impressed us was that Mike was as excited as we were when we spotted  whales or dolphins or the humorous manta rays.  (The manta rays couldn\'t seem to decide if they were fish or birds as they playfully threw themselves out of the water and flapped their "wings" like birds!)  And we spotted MANY whales, dolphins and manta rays!  Mike continually maneuvered the boat around so that we had a great view of the magnificent whales while respecting their territory.  In addition to all this fun, we were served a delicious dinner of Mahi mahi with mango/cilantro sauce and rice with a chips and guacamole garnish all prepared on board by Michelle. We were even offered a second plate and three of our husbands took advantage of this generous offer!  Included in the cruise is an open bar. Guests can have about anything they want to drink including beer, punch, margaritas, soda pop, water, etc.  \nWe had a great time!  Thanks again, Mike!

193303355.name: Marvelous day on the sea
193303355.author: a TripAdvisor user
193303355.reviewBody:
We had that lovely sailing trip to Yelapa and I must say it was definitely the highlight of our week. The owner Mike and his wife Michele couldn't be better hosts, they tended to us like if we would be family.
The dolphins and whale sightings where just out of this world. 
Yelapa was a superb destination for a day trip, make sure you are going to see the waterfalls.
Congratulations and we hope we are soon back with you guys on that wonderful like brand new sailing boat. THANKS

193000941.name: Seeing the Bay of Banderas in style......
193000941.author: a TripAdvisor user
193000941.reviewBody: I have been out with Mike and Michelle on Indian Summer many times and each time was special and more than memorable.  The courtesy of both of them, along with excellent food and non stop beverages......not to mention the countless sighings of whales and dolphins......amazing day trips, each and every one!

192865741.name: Phenomenal hosts! Exceptional sunset, whalewatching & sailing experience!
192865741.author: a TripAdvisor user
192865741.reviewBody: Exceptional is the best way to express how Mike and Michelle treat you, from the first contact until you leave the yacht! There are so many things I say to folks when sharing about them and Red Dolphin Sailing Charters but trust and safe and DELIGHT are always on the top of the list!! Read more here: then book a charter! \n\nhttp://innandaroundlacruz.com/2012/12/09/171299048/

192455159.name: What a fantastic experience with Red Dolphin Sailing Charters
192455159.author: a TripAdvisor user
192455159.reviewBody:
My wife and I recently went on a whale watching charter with Red Dolphin and it was a fantastic experience.  Mike and Michelle made us most welcome and their sail boat was very comfortable and offered us lots of room to enjoy the trip.

Mike is an excellent sailor and was able to get us so close to the whales, for us to get some fantastic pictures of the whales.  It was a whale watching trip of a lifetime!!

Michelle fixed us a wonderful lunch and they provided us with cold beer or soft drinks of our choice.

This year we plan to go on a sunset cruise with Red Dolphin.

We would like to highly recommend Red Dolphin Sailing Charters to anyone looking for a safe, well run and wonderful time whale watching or just chartering Red Dolphin for an afternoon or evening sail.

Thank you so much Mike and Michelle for a wonderful day.

192246869.name: Once is not enough!
192246869.author: a TripAdvisor user
192246869.reviewBody: As a special treat over Christmas, our family and a few close friends decided to hire a sailboat to take us to Yelapa for the day. Red Dolphin was recommended to us by a good friend and it was an unforgettable experience. Captain Mike and his partner Michelle are amazing hosts, extremely knowledgeable and both of them kept us thoroughly entertained throughout the trip. The Red Dolphin is a beautiful yacht, very luxurious and easily accommodated our group of 9. We had an absolutely wonderful day sailing and our visit to Yelapa was so much fun. We are already talking about where we want to go on our next sailing charter. And make no mistake, we will definitely hire Red Dolphin again and again. Thanks guys. You\'re the best!

192130652.name: Sailing from La Cruz
192130652.author: a TripAdvisor user
192130652.reviewBody: I have been on 3 sailing charters with Mike and Michelle and loved every one of them. They are wonderful hosts and very knowledgeable. The food on board was delicious and Mike always has great music playing. I have met some wonderful people on board and look forward to doing another charter with friends from Canada very soon!

190665256.name: Amazing Experience
190665256.author: a TripAdvisor user
190665256.reviewBody: Guys, if you wish to have a very personal and amazing trip to the Marieta Island, Red Dolphin is the company to go with. The boat may be a little expensive ($600USD) for some people and for some other may not be. It all depends on your budget, however, the experience will be worthy 1000x times more. The captain has so many stories to tell as well as live advices to give. The girl in charge is such a darling and the crew is so cool. \n\nGuys, take the chance to go with Red Dolphin. They will give you an amazing experience.

177316955.name: The Best Sailing Experience in the Bay
177316955.author: a TripAdvisor user
177316955.reviewBody: We have enjoyed Red Dolphin cruises many times and whenever we have guests we make sure to take them out with Red Dolphin.  Captain Mike and the lovely Michelle are The Best!  Mike really knows his boat, which is very well maintained and immaculate.   He is happy to share his knowledge of the sea, and of the area.  His confidence and abilities really make for a comfortable and enjoyable experience.  Michelle is a wonderful hostess, making sure that our every wish is met.  She is abundantly charming, also very knowledgeable, and she offers up the most tasty food and drink.  A day with Red Dolphin is sure to be a memorable experience.
